segments.text: Of course . What would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want a bottle of champagne , lobster tail , and filet mignon , medium rare .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so sorry . We ran out of filet mignon . May I suggest the porterhouse instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad , but the porterhouse will be okay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I be so bold as to suggest chocolate-covered strawberries with the champagne ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No strawberries . We'll charge your amenities account , if that's okay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Charge it to whatever account you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your meal will be delivered as soon as it's all ready . Enjoy !
segments.speaker: S2
